DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy topical 0.5 % S-MPEC cream vs. placebo cream ( applied twice daily 14 day ) treatment Grade I - III hemorrhoid .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Diagnosis grade I III hemorrhoid bleed episode least every day last two week enrollment study . Patients sign Informed Consent form . Patients protrude irreducible hemorrhoid ( grade IV ) . Patients anal fistula , periproctitis hemorrhagic diathesis Patients current history Type I Type II diabetes mellitus . Patients severe hepatic , renal cardiovascular disorder . Patients type infectious disease . Patients involve another experimental drug trial within past 30 day . Patients presently diagnose cancer . Patients know alcohol drug abuse . Patients require use suppository . Patients blood urine laboratory value outside normal limit value consider abnormal opinion investigator .
